About Me

Cinematography • Colour grading • Software development

I'm a freelancer based in Edinburgh, active throughout Scotland and the UK. Working primarily in the camera department, I have experience as a camera trainee and 2nd AC on high-end projects and regularly work as Director of Photography and Colourist on short films and commercials.

I have been involved in many different types of projects, ranging from feature films to live events. Currently, I also work as a director of photography at MBP, an award-winning Scottish production company.

Despite a strong focus on cinematography and colour grading, I am also skilled in video editing, graphic design, and software development. This perhaps reveals what I enjoy most about content creation: mastering a wide array of technical skills to best articulate a creative idea.

Get in touch

If you would like to get in touch, please feel free to reach out via contact@piersdeseilligny.com
